      • setScanOnlyInScope

        public void setScanOnlyInScope(boolean scanOnlyInScope)
        Sets whether or not the passive scan should be performed only on messages that are in scope.
        Parameters:
        scanOnlyInScope - true if the scan should be performed only on messages that are in scope, false otherwise.
        Since:
        2.6.0
        See Also:
        isScanOnlyInScope(), Session.isInScope(String)
